actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Small Business
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Small Business.
Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Small Business with amendment, S. Rept. 95-371.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Referred to House Committee on Small Business.
Reported to House from the Committee on Small Business with amendment, H. Rept. 95-758.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #727 (234-170).

official_title: A bill to provide temporary authority to the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to facilitate water conservation practices and emergency actions to mitigate the impacts of the 1976-1977 drought.
short_title: Small Business Emergency Drought Disaster Loan Act

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Small Business with amendment, H. Rept. 95-758) Amends the Small Business Act to authorize the Small Business Administration to make its physical disaster loans, except those to homeowners on their primary residences, to cover losses involving droughts and other disasters occurring during the period January 1, 1978, to October 1, 1978, at a three percent rate of interest on loans up to $40,000, and a five percent rate of interest on loans over $40,000 and up to $250,000.

titles.title: Small Business Emergency Drought Disaster Loan Act

A bill to provide temporary authority to the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to facilitate water conservation practices and emergency actions to mitigate the impacts of the 1976-1977 drought.
